person.persName: Philip Burton Thompson, Sr. (Provisional Government of Kentucky)

body.p: A Kentucky attorney, soldier, and politician. Admitted to the bar and practiced law in Mercer County, Kentucky. Married twice, first to Martha Adelaide Montgomery Thompson and a second time to Almedia Mundy Thompson. Father of Daviess/Davis M. Thompson, Philip “Little Phil” Burton Thompson, Jr., and John Burton Thompson. Member of the Whig Party. Served as a captain in the Second Regiment Kentucky Foot Volunteers in the Mexican War from 1846 to 1847. Served as a member of the Council of Ten in the Provisional Government of Kentucky.
